FHY applicationÂ¶

The purpose of this application is to allow the user submit personal data to each space. This means that each personal space will have his own folders and files. Using the application FriendyControl you can control who can watch your files.

The following links explains how the model was built:

  • in models you can find how the model was built,
  • in view you can find out how the views acts.

    • Models:
  • FHY Views
